item.text: “I tell you the solemn truth, the one who does not enter the sheepfold by the door, but climbs in some other way, is a thief and a robber.

The one who <st data-num="1525" class="">enters</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="4166" class="">shepherd</st> of the <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st>.

The <st data-num="2377" class="">doorkeeper</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="455" class="">opens</st> the door<n id="2" /> for <st data-num="3778">him</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>. He<n id="4" /> <st data-num="5455" class="">calls</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1806" class="">leads</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1806" class="">out</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3752" class="">When</st> he has <st data-num="1544" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1544" class="">out</st>, he <st data-num="4198" class="">goes</st> <st data-num="1715" class="">ahead</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="1492" class="">recognize</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>.

They will <st data-num="3756 3361">never</st> <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> a <st data-num="245" class="">stranger</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> will <st data-num="5343">run away</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">recognize</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="245">stranger’s</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>.”<n id="3" />
Jesus told them this parable, but they did not understand what he was saying to them.
So Jesus said again, “I tell you the solemn truth, I am the door for the sheep.

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> <st data-num="3745">who</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2812" class="">thieves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3027" class="">robbers</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st>. <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enters</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, he will be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="1525">come in</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1831">go out</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="3542" class="">pasture</st>.<n id="2" />
The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come so that they may have life, and may have it abundantly.
“I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

The <st data-num="3411">hired hand</st>,<n id="1" /> who <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="4166" class="">shepherd</st> and does <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">own</st> <st data-num="4263">sheep</st>, <st data-num="2334" class="">sees</st> the <st data-num="3074" class="">wolf</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="863" class="">abandons</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="4263">sheep</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5343">runs away</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="3074" class="">wolf</st> <st data-num="726" class="">attacks</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="846">sheep</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4650" class="">scatters</st> them.
Because he is a hired hand and is not concerned about the sheep, he runs away.
“I am the good shepherd. I know my own and my own know me—

<st data-num="2531">just as</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">knows</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2504" class="">and I</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="5087">lay down</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st>.

I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="833" class="">sheepfold</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="71" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="2548">them too</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">so that</st><n id="5" /> there will <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3391">one</st> <st data-num="4167" class="">flock</st> and<n id="6" /> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4166" class="">shepherd</st>.

<st data-num="1223 3778">This is why</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="25" class="">loves</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="1" />—<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="5087">lay down</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> I may <st data-num="2983" class="">take</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">back</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>.
No one takes it away from me, but I lay it down of my own free will. I have the authority to lay it down, and I have the authority to take it back again. This commandment I received from my Father.”
Another sharp division took place among the Jewish people because of these words.

<st data-num="4183" class="">Many</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> were <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “He is <st data-num="2192" class="">possessed</st> by a <st data-num="1140" class="">demon</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> has <st data-num="3105" class="">lost</st> his <st data-num="3105" class="">mind</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">Why</st> do you <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>?”
Others said, “These are not the words of someone possessed by a demon. A demon cannot cause the blind to see, can it?”
Then came the feast of the Dedication in Jerusalem.

It <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="5494">winter</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> was <st data-num="4043" class="">walking</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411" class="">temple area</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4672">Solomon’s</st> <st data-num="4745" class="">Portico</st>.<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="2453">Jewish leaders</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2944" class="">surrounded</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">asked</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="2193 4219">How long</st> will <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="142" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="5590 1473">us</st> in suspense?<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3954" class="">plainly</st>.”<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>. The <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962">Father’s</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">refuse</st> to <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st>.

<st data-num="1699" class="">My</st> <st data-num="4263" class="">sheep</st> <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>, <st data-num="2504">and I</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="2504" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="3756 3361">never</st> <st data-num="622" class="">perish;</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> will <st data-num="726" class="">snatch</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">My</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="3739">who</st> has <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> them to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">greater</st> than <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="726" class="">snatch</st><n id="2" /> them <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> my <st data-num="3962">Father’s</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>.
The Father and I are one.”
The Jewish leaders picked up rocks again to stone him to death.

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “I have <st data-num="1166" class="">shown</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>. <st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="4169" class="">which</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> are you <st data-num="3034" class="">going to stone</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?”
The Jewish leaders replied, “We are not going to stone you for a good deed but for blasphemy because you, a man, are claiming to be God.”
Jesus answered, “Is it not written in your law, ‘I said, you are gods’?

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="1565">those people</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st> were <st data-num="3004">called</st> ‘<st data-num="2316">gods</st>’ (<st data-num="2532">and</st> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scripture</st> <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> be <st data-num="3089" class="">broken)</st>,<n id="1" />

do <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> about the one <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="37" class="">set apart</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, ‘You are <st data-num="987" class="">blaspheming,’</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, ‘I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God’</st>?

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> I do <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">perform</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487">if</st> I <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> them, <st data-num="2579">even if</st> you do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">so that</st> you may come to <st data-num="1097">know</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2504" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2504">and</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”
Then they attempted again to seize him, but he escaped their clutches.
Jesus went back across the Jordan River again to the place where John had been baptizing at an earlier time, and he stayed there.

<st data-num="4183" class="">Many</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> began to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, “<st data-num="2491" class="">John</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">performed</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4592">miraculous sign</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="227" class="">true</st>!”
And many believed in Jesus there.
